title: Vision. [No. 29]
creator_credit: United States Information Agency, SA Films and Sidney R Aronson
brief_description: Cinemagazine: Mt Copper, Colorado - hot dog skiing, free style; Korczak Ziolkowski, mountain carver - Memorial to Chief Crazy Horse being carved at Thunderhead Mountain; Music on the move - St Paul Chamber Orchestra; Driverless vehicles - “robots” in Detroit’s Harpers Hospital move through specially designed tunnels and corridors, take their own elevators and carry food, linen and supplies; Richard Petty, racecar driver - winner of over 150 US Grand National races. Narrated by Michael Tolan.
